description:
Please note that the expiration date of the item is 2026-Feb-12. Exchange & refund is not possible due to this reason. Description

A fresh, cleansing tissue containing rice bran water from Cheorwon, Gangwon Province that removes makeup and impurities while leaving skin bright and refreshed.
Suggested Use

Open the sticker cover, take out a cleansing wipe then gently wipe along skin to remove makeup and impurities.
When cleansing the eye area, close your eyes to avoid the formula getting into your eyes.
After use, lightly rinse with lukewarm water and close the cover to prevent the tissues from drying.

description:
Description

-An one-step cleansing pad that effectively removes makeup and skin impurities leaving skin clean and refreshed.
-Soft, big size cleansing pads infused with mildly acidic cleansing water help to balance skin after cleansing.
-Contains 5 Hyaluronic Acids to strengthen skin's moisture barrier and replenish hydration.
-Formulated with non-ionic surfactants that are non-irritating and gentle on skin.

Suggested Use

1. Wipe entire face with the embossed side with eyes closed to remove impurities. 

2. Flip over and gently wipe sensitive areas around lips and eyes with the soft cotton side.

description:
Description

This two-layer structure make up remover contains mineral-rich thermal water and moisturizing the delicate eye area and lips. Created to give protection to the sensitive eyes and around the mouth make-up worn by a long period of time.

Contains moisturizing ingredients to prevent dryness after cleansing
Eau Marine: Bi-phase formula, refreshing marine scent 

Suggested Use

1. Shake well before use. 
2. Take a suitable amount on a cotton pad and place it where you wish to be cleansed and leave for a moment then gently wipe it off and rinse lightly with lukewarm water.

Key Ingredients

Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Pentylene Glycol, Water, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Butylene Glycol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Disodium EDTA, 1,2-Hexanediol, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract, Rose Extract, Rumex Acetosella Extract, Chrysanthellum Indicum Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Aristotelia Chilensis Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Fragaria Chiloensis (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Lycium Chinense Fruit Extract, Morus Nigra Fruit Extract, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Fruit Extract, Rubus Coreanus Fruit Extract, Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Fruit Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin

description:
Description
Removes even the heaviest of water proof and long lasting makeup!- A two layered product that removes all point makeup- Gentle on your eyes and lips- Offers a clean and refreshing marine scent.

Suggested Use
1. Before use, shake the contents to mix the two layers2. Pour onto a cotton pad and gently wipe away your makeup


 Ingredients

Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isohexadecane, Dipropylene Glycol, phreatic water, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Extract, Chrysanthellum Indicum Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract, Rumex acetosella Extract, Rose Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Lycium Chinense Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Fragaria Chiloensis (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Morus Nigra Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Rubus Coreanus Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract, Sodium Chloride, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Capric Triglyceride, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, 1,2-Hexandiol, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, CI 61565

product_name: *renewal* Rice Water Bright Lip & Eye Remover 120ml
description:
Description
As a ‘Emulsion in Toner’ formula, Rice Water Bright Lip & Eye Remover is separated into 2 layers with milk-colored emulsion on top and clear water base on bottom part. This mild makeup remover for lip and eye especially eliminates even the most stubborn makeup residue without irritation and leaves skin soft and moist to the touch. Its powerful, moisturizing formula and its milky texture are suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin. Rice water also has brightening effects, keeping eyes and lips luminous even after wearing makeup for long hours. 

Suggested Use
Pour a small amount of the product on a cotton put and press on the eyes and/or lips for a couple of seconds. Gently wipe on and rinse with lukewarm water.
 
Ingredients
Water/Eau, Cyclomethicone, Mineral Oil, Oryza Sativa(Rice) Extract, Phaseolus Radiatus Extract, Betula Platyphylla Japonica Bark Extract, Rumex Crispus Root Extract, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Sd Alcohol 40-B, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ppg-26-Buteth-26, Allantoin, Cellulose Gum, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Moringa Pterygosperma Seed Oil, Saponaria Officinalis Leaf Extract, Parfum/Fragrance, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde
